1    | /***********************************************************
2    |  
3    |  $Header: /djgpp/sv2agw/agwhdr.h 1.0 Fri 07-21-2000 4:06:09 pm $
4    | 
5    |  This header file contains the structure definition of the
6    |  AGWPE TCP header
7    | **************************************************************/
8    | 
9    | #ifndef __agwhdr_h__	/*+ Avoid multiple inclusions +*/
10   | #define __agwhdr_h__
11   | 
12   | #ifndef BYTE
13   | #define BYTE unsigned char
14   | #endif
15   | 
16   | /*
17   |  * Until C compilers support C++ namespaces, we use this
18   |  * prefix for our namespace.
19   |  */
20   | #ifndef NAMESPACE
21   | #define NAMESPACE(x)    _w32_ ## x     
22   | #endif
23   | 
24   | #ifndef WORD
25   | #define WORD unsigned short
26   | #endif
27   | 
28   | #ifndef DWORD
29   | #define DWORD unsigned long
30   | #endif
31   | 
32   | typedef struct _agwpe_hdr_ {
33   |   BYTE port;		      /*+ Radio port  +*/
34   |   BYTE reserved[3];	      /*+ Reserved  +*/
35   |   char datakind;	      /*+ Type of AGWPE message +*/
36   |   BYTE reserved2;	      /*+ Reserved  +*/
37   |   BYTE pid;			      /*+ PID of the received AGWPE message  +*/
38   |   BYTE reserved3;	      /*+ Reserved  +*/
39   |   char callfrom[10];	  /*+ From callsign  +*/
40   |   char callto[10];		  /*+ To callsign +*/
41   |   unsigned long datalen;  /*+ Indicates how much data will follow  +*/
42   |   unsigned long user;	  /*+ ???  +*/ 
43   | } 									 
44   | AGWPE_HDR;
45   | 
46   | #endif
